long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inker is an intuitive yet developmental tool to aid web readers with the facility to highlight texts in the web page and also save them in the google docs for future reference. Things get interesting with various color and highlighting customization that inker offers. Give it a try !

Need to resume reading a webpage after a break, Do not  worry! we have got u covered. Inker keeps the highlighted text in a webpage until u do not need it. Thus, making web reading a breeze! 
Just ensure that you always use inker in full screen window to achieve best results.

Still in development! Do not engage.
